summary: 65 Framed wall pictures, intended as a modders resource not a playable file, it does however come with an .esp file that can be used in game.
descriptionHtml:
65 Framed wall pictures, intended as a modders resource not a playable file, it does however come with an .esp file that can be used in game.
I made the pictures for a mod I\'m currently working on, as I find Skyrim has very little in the way of interior decoration.
I just thought I\'d post them into a pack in case anyone else wanted to use them.

The mesh used is a retextured version of a standard Skyrim mesh that came with the game and all the pictures are of screenshots from Skyrim.
author: Richard Valongo
